description:
The Galactic Alliance of Humankind leads the human race through space, long after they have abandoned Earth. Their sworn enemy for space supremacy are the rival http://anidb.net/ch55788 [Hideauze].
It is later revealed that the Galactic Alliance of Humankind left http://anidb.net/t2630 [Earth] an attempt to survive after their escape from Earth heading into an ice age. One faction of the human race developed advanced technology to enable them to survive in space. The opposing faction chose a different path, and became the Hideauze.
name: Jinrui Ginga Doumei
